name: Invesco ESG Canadian Core Plus Bond ETF
longDescription: BESG seeks to provide investment returns through a combination of income and capital growth In order to achieve its investment objective, BESG invests primarily in debt securities that are rated investment grade. BESG invests in debt securities issued by debt issuers that exhibit favourable environmental, social and governance (ESG) practices and ESG-linked debt issuances (ESG-labelled bonds).
fulldescription: BESG seeks to provide investment returns through a combination of income and capital growth In order to achieve its investment objective, BESG invests primarily in debt securities that are rated investment grade. BESG invests in debt securities issued by debt issuers that exhibit favourable environmental, social and governance (ESG) practices and ESG-linked debt issuances (ESG-labelled bonds). ESG-labelled bonds are debt instruments linked to activities that positively contribute to certain environmental or social sustainability objectives, and include green, social, sustainability and sustainability-linked bonds
fullAddress: 5140 Yonge Street, Suite 900, Toronto, Ontario, CA
